name: You're a Dog. Have a Good Day.
name_original: You're a Dog. Have a Good Day.
description: You are a dog, and as such, you are determined to enjoy your day. Life as a dog is consequence free, and your upbeat and simple view of the world will carry you through any situations. Choose how you spend your time, whether you’d prefer to relax safely at home or go out on a grand adventure! Many things await you in the world beyond your yard. Perhaps you will meet the love of your life, or maybe make a new enemy. You can get into mischief or just be a good boy. Regardless of how you play, you will have a good day.
